features: 💦CLASSIC GAMES: Enjoy 268 classic games on this handheld game console with a novel design and joystick, perfect for kids ages 4-12.Packed with exciting puzzle, action, educational,and sports games.This game console provides girls and boys a well-rounded gaming experience.Believe that you and your kids will fall in love with this small gaming player machine.

💦RECHARGEABLE: Rechargeable battery ensures 4-5 hours of uninterrupted gaming fun, making it a great travel companion for long trips. A general-purpose micro USB charging port, very convenient to charge. Eliminate the trouble of frequently replacing AAA batteries.Interface for seamless gaming experience.

💦SIMPLE AND EASY TO USE: User-friendly design makes it simple and easy for kids to use, whether they're playing at home or on the go. With its comfortable and intuitive controls, even 4 year olds can enjoy gaming fun without having to worry about complicated buttons or controls.

💦USER-FRIENDLY DESIGN: Regardless of the size or the size and layout of the buttons, this game console fully considers the portability and practicality of the child. Parents are worried about their little cute excessive use of mobile phones or pads, easy to be affected by bad content on the Internet. This game console is a very good substitute. No matter whether your kids are on the road or at home, it is a reassuring partner.

🎀GREAT GIFT FOR KIDS－This game console is great for birthday, christmas, and party gifts for children. This will be a big surprise for them. And we offer a 6 months hassle-free warranty,our warranty covers any defect caused . Please feel free to contact us if you have any problem, we will solve it for you within 24 hours!
body.description: Welcome to our store! This Beico handheld game console built-in 268 classic retro games. It powered by lithium battery. Most games are the representation games. So the game experience will be full fun and great. As a birthday or Christmas gift for the kids will be really rare and surprise. About Gaming: 1. The greatest significance of the game lies in exploring and discovering, so that you can continue to enter the unknown and grow! Enjoy your game process. 2. Since the games are design by different companies, there will be differences in operation. Some games may only have 2 or 3 function keys working. This is not the button fault. 3. Some games may have multiple versions and do not represent a game repetition, different versions increase the map and different gameplay. 4. When the machine has muted sound, slowed sound, scratched screen or been in dead state, please replace batteries to get optimum performance. Package Contains: 1 x Game console 1 x USB cable 1 x User manual 1× Rechargeable lithium battery Specially designed retail gift box Service Tips: We strive to provide great customer service and want to make sure you are completely satisfied. If there are any issues or questions, please contact us. Our customer support team is 24 hours ready to help! Precaution & Warning: 1. Before using the product, please read the instructions carefully. 2. Remove the batteries from the unit if sit will not be used for an extended period of the time. 3. Don't use the wall charge when playing. 4. Do not short circuit battery contacts or dispose of batteries in fire. 5. Please struck a proper balance between play and rest!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2020
reviews.reviewText: My 4 1/2 and 6yo are both obsessed with this! The charge lasts surprisingly long and the games are challenging to keep their interests but the controls were simple enough for them to figure our themselves. I'm pleasantly surprised by the quality of this game given the price!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Fun traveling entertainment!
reviews.reviewText: Traveling with kids - this little gadget will make trip easier on everyone!Stays charged about 3 hours, then simply re charge with a USB.Our 2 grandsons loved them - ages 5 and 7. Kept them entertained for a big portion of our trip.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewText: My kids have these and they love them. For the price ai paid it was a steal.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 28, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Inexpensive and fun gadget for a while...
reviews.reviewText: I got this for my boys for Christmas and they liked this for a little while, but overall got bored with it pretty quickly. (2ish months if that)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 25, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Our son loves it
reviews.reviewText: Our son loves this! Perfect for a 5 year old, the battery lasts a good long while and he really enjoys the games. Perfect for the starter gamer.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Only had since Christmas and will not hold a charge

reviews.reviewerName: This is easy to break its low quality don't buy

reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars There are better options available
reviews.reviewText: I like how there's games but the felling of it is disgusting

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 26, 2019
reviews.reviewText: Bought for our little girl to play with as a distraction at restaurants. In fact, we call it her "restaurant game." Easy for her to figure out. Not super high tech, but fine for the purpose. She plays games on a tablet at home, but still has fun with this.
